name: Semi Terrestrial Invaders
description:
Welcome Invader! Lets see which of you two can capture the most humans!

Players can capture humans two ways. First, they can mind control them and they will walk back to the base themselves or they can drag them back to their base. Players can steal each others mind controlled humans as they're walking back to the base. 

This game requires two xbox controllers to play :
- Press X to mind control a human 
- Press B to drag them back to your base.
